_sText:
**About**
=========

**Prefab made by DomiTibingen**

Only for Source games

Feel FREE to USE them in your maps and videos :) and CREDIT ME ;)

This prefab is an exploding oil barrel. The **LEFT** one is default hl2 exploding barrel and the **RIGHT** one is my prefab.
It acts just like default hl2 exploding oil drum. When you shot it it will start burning..after few seconds it will explode and turn into damaged prop (brush) ...the explosion will crate short smoke and turn damaged prop to emit smoke.

**Copy file to your Steam/steamapps/common/Source_game/bin/prefabs**

**PREVIEW:**
========
